bilingual.source: Computer application technology is used in various industries.
bilingual.target: 计算机应用技术在各行各业中都有应用。

bilingual.source: Click the icon to open the application.
bilingual.target: 点击图标打开应用程序。
这个应用程序加载得非常快。

bilingual.source: Click on the icon to open the application.
bilingual.target: 点击图标打开应用程序。

bilingual.source: She clicks the icon to start the application.
bilingual.target: 她点击图标启动应用程序。

bilingual.source: Double-click the icon to open the application.
bilingual.target: 双击图标以打开应用程序。

bilingual.source: The application of pressure stopped the bleeding.
bilingual.target: 压力的应用止住了出血。
这个应用程序支持全屏显示。

bilingual.source: This application can help you clear data.
bilingual.target: 这个应用程序可以帮助你清除数据。

bilingual.source: We need to change the port of the application.
bilingual.target: 我们需要更改应用程序的端口。

yingyinNormal.en: My mission has been to investigate the application of paranormal powers in military defense. Or offense.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的任务是调查超自然力量在军事防御中的应用，或攻击。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll cut to the chase. The Air Force believes there's an application for this technology, and we're interested in funding your research.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就不兜圈子了，美国空军想将这项技术投入到实际应用中，我们有兴趣投资你们的研究。

yingyinNormal.en: Application? I'm actually more of a theorist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 申请？我实际上更多是理论家。

yingyinNormal.en: The application in your hand. Give it to her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是说你手里的申请表，给她。

yingyinNormal.en: The application for specific performance is denied.
yingyinNormal.zh: 故对该合同特定条款的有效性应予否认。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't believe you have to fill out a preschool application for an infant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真不敢相信你得为一个婴儿开始填幼儿园的申请表。

yingyinNormal.en: I see what you guys are saying. I'll go downstairs and fill out an application.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我懂了，我下楼填申请表。

yingyinNormal.en: Joke all you want, but this looks good on an application to NYU or UCLA or KFC.
yingyinNormal.zh: 随便你们开玩笑，但这种经历在申请纽约大学加州大学洛杉矶分校或肯德基时会很有用。

yingyinNormal.en: And for application, I just make kind of a three shape on my cheeks and I guess that's it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了效果，我在我的脸颊上按照3的形状涂抹，就是这样啦。

yingyinNormal.en: But it isn't relevant to asylum. Maybe not, but it is relevant to an application for a T visa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这和庇护无关。或许无关，但和申请T签证有关。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, you can't be doing this right now. You got finals. Your NYU application is due in what, two weeks?
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，你现在不可以这么做。你有期末考，纽约大学的申请，过两星期就到期了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't even mean it that way. Now I was thinking more along the lines of business experience, college application.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我根本没那意思，我更多考虑的是工作经历，申请大学。

yingyinNormal.en: But this so was. You know it changed everything. Like, the other day, I got this credit card application and I was pre-approved.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过这个是啊，它改变了一切，前几天呢，我去申请信用卡，我竟然被预先审核了。

yingyinNormal.en: I submitted an application for the intern program about a month ago and I would just love the opportunity to sit with you briefly...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一个月前交了份实习申请表，我想找机会和您坐下来简单谈谈。

yingyinNormal.en: Bob Dylan again, Your Honor? It's a good claim, Mrs. Florrick. Actually, it's an excellent claim, but unfortunately I can't consider a visa application.
yingyinNormal.zh: 又是鲍勃·迪伦吗？法官阁下。这是个很好的诉求，福瑞克夫人，实际上非常好，但很可惜，我不能考虑签证申请。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 申请；应用；涂抹于表面；敷用；持续的努力；艰苦的工作；应用程序；应用软件；关联；实际运用

sense_info_list.en: the action of putting something into operation

examination_example.sentence: Its <highlight>application</highlight> has boosted battery storage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的应用提高了电池的存储能力。

examination_example.sentence: The author’s attitude toward the <highlight>application</highlight> of AI to healthcare is cautious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者对人工智能在医疗保健领域的应用持谨慎态度。

examination_example.sentence: The creation of the ‘statistics board' was motivated by concerns broadly with the <highlight>application</highlight> of statistics and data analysis in scientific research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 统计审稿编委会的设立源于对统计学和数据分析在科学研究中运用情况的普遍担忧。

sense_info_list.en: an official request for something, usually in writing

examination_example.sentence: Many students find themselves listing one major on their college <highlight>applications</highlight>, but switching to another after taking college classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多学生发现自己在申请大学时填写了一个专业，但在上完大学课程后就转到了另一个专业。

examination_example.sentence: Entergy will withdraw its Plymouth <highlight>application</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Entergy将撤回其在普利茅斯的申请。

examination_example.sentence: But as the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) reviews the company's <highlight>application</highlight>, it should keep in mind what promises from Entergy are worth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但当核管理委员会（NRC）审阅该公司的申请时，他们应该考虑 Entergy 的承诺有多少价值。

sense_info_list.en: a program that performs a particular task or set of tasks

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Applications</highlight> have the potential to add stickiness by amusing, entertaining and enlightening others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 应用程序有可能通过逗乐、娱乐和启发他人来增加用户粘度。

sense_info_list.en: the action of putting something on a surface
determination to work hard at something; great effort

word_usage.usage: application指正式的申请，与其相对应的动词词组为apply for，表示“申请”。
在计算机技术领域，application指应用程序，常缩写为app。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 实施; 应用; 生效

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 申请；应用；涂抹于表面；敷用；持续的努力；艰苦的工作；应用程序；应用软件；关联；实际运用

sense_info_list.en: an official request for something, usually in writing
a program that performs a particular task or set of tasks
the action of putting something into operation
sense_info_list.zh: 实施; 应用; 生效

examination_example.sentence: He was the first person to imagine a practical <highlight>application</highlight> for the wireless spectrum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是第一个设想无线频谱实际应用的人。

examination_example.sentence: It depends on the required knowledge for <highlight>application</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它取决于应用所需的知识。

examination_example.sentence: The design objective and the business commitment were to sportswear, and the distinctive traits were problem-solving ingenuity and realistic lifestyle <highlight>applications</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 设计目标和商业承诺是对运动服的，其鲜明特征是解决问题的独创性和现实生活方式的应用。

sense_info_list.en: the practical conclusion or lesson to be derived from a speech or writing (such as a moral tale)

sense_info_list.en: an official request for something; usually in writing

examination_example.sentence: But it is best to submit your <highlight>application</highlight> early because universities begin work as soon as forms start rolling in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但最好尽早提交您的申请，因为一旦表格开始滚动，大学就会开始工作。

examination_example.sentence: The most important part of the <highlight>application</highlight> is the much feared personal statement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 申请中最重要的部分是令人恐惧的个人陈述。

examination_example.sentence: When you are going to submit your <highlight>application</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你要提交你的申请时。

sense_info_list.en: the action of putting something into operation
sense_info_list.zh: 实施; 应用; 生效

examination_example.sentence: Lawmakers in Michigan clearly want to make the state ready for the commercial <highlight>application</highlight> of self-driving technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 密歇根州的立法者显然非常希望该州能为发展自动驾驶技术的商业化用途做好准备。

sense_info_list.en: a program that performs a particular task or set of tasks

examination_example.sentence: Managers should exert substantial effort in ensuring their IT team eliminates programming errors and <highlight>application</highlight> crashes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 管理者应尽最大努力确保其IT团队消除编程错误和应用程序崩溃。

申请表；申请表格；申请书

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 申请；应用；涂抹于表面；敷用；持续的努力；艰苦的工作；应用程序；应用软件；关联；实际运用

sense_info_list.en: an official request for something, usually in writing

examination_example.sentence: Submit your <highlight>application</highlight> to www.lancasterdesign.org
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将您的申请提交到www.lancasterdesign.org

examination_example.sentence: Your <highlight>application</highlight> will be accessed by UNESCO managers and will stay in our database for six months.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 您的申请将被联合国教科文组织的管理人员访问，并将在我们的数据库中保留六个月。

examination_example.sentence: What should applicants do before filling out the <highlight>application</highlight> form?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 申请人在填写申请表前应该做什么？

sense_info_list.en: the action of putting something into operation
sense_info_list.zh: 实施; 应用; 生效

examination_example.sentence: Its practical <highlight>application</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的实际应用

examination_example.sentence: They have potential <highlight>applications</highlight> in everything from education to health care and are already finding their way into some of these spaces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们在从教育到医疗保健的方方面面都有潜在的应用，并且已经开始进入其中一些领域。

sense_info_list.en: a program that performs a particular task or set of tasks

examination_example.sentence: If you do not receive any update within six months, it means that your <highlight>application</highlight> has not been successful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果您在六个月内没有收到任何更新的消息，则意味着您的申请没有成功。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Check what you have written before you hand in your <highlight>application</highlight> form.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你递交申请表之前，检查一下你所写的内容。

examination_example.sentence: Please include a recent photograph in your <highlight>application</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请在申请中附上一张近照。

examination_example.sentence: Fill in an <highlight>application</highlight> online．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在线填写申请。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese companies lead in global 5G patent <highlight>applications</highlight>（专利应用） with Huawei taking the crown．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国企业在全球5G专利应用中领先，华为独占鳌头。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese companies topped the list for most 5G SEPs <highlight>applications</highlight> in communication systems by the end of April 2019．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 截至2019年4月底，中国企业在通信系统中5G SEPs应用最多。

examination_example.sentence: Many <highlight>applications</highlight> will make 5G more advanced．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多应用将使5G更加先进。
